alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:53PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 245 PM PDT... At 152 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, or 8 miles southwest of Palm Springs. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Palm Springs, eastern Anza, Hwy 74 Between Anza And Palm Desert, Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, Lake Hemet and Santa Rosa Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
